summary: This is the story of a few men of power and the war they are waging. A story of today's princes, settling their accounts with stock-exchange, financial plots and O.P.A.
cast: Sami Bouajila|Jean-Paul Roussillon|Wladimir Yordanoff|László Szabó|Anna Mouglalis|Bakary Sangaré|Hippolyte Girardot|Anne Consigny|Xavier Beja|Pierre Barrat|Gil Demurger|David Frenkel|Philippe Paimblanc|Arnaud Desplechin|Nicolas Saada
title: En jouant 'Dans la compagnie des hommes'
